name: twitch_scrape_category
description: Scrape a Twitch category/game directory page. Returns live streams in the category with streamer names, viewer counts, titles, and tags.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Category or game name (e.g. 'Just Chatting', 'League of Legends', 'Fortnite', 'Music')

steps.code: const streams = []; const streamEls = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="tower"] article, [class*="stream-card"], [data-a-target*="card"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(streamEls.length, 20); i++) { const el = streamEls[i]; const nameEl = el.querySelector('[data-a-target="preview-card-channel-link"], [class*="channel-name"], h3'); const titleEl = el.querySelector('[data-a-target="preview-card-title-link"], [class*="stream-title"], h3 + p'); const viewersEl = el.querySelector('[class*="viewer"], [aria-label*="viewer"]'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('img'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[href]'); const tags = []; el.querySelectorAll('[data-a-target="stream-tag"], [class*="tag"] button').forEach(function(tag) { tags.push(tag.textContent.trim()); }); streams.push({ channel: nameEl ? nameEl.textContent.trim() : '', title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', viewers: viewersEl ? viewersEl.textContent.trim() : '', tags: tags.slice(0, 5), url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '', thumbnail: imgEl ? imgEl.getAttribute('src') : '' }); } const categoryTitleEl = document.querySelector('h1, [class*="directory-header"] h1'); const viewerTotalEl = document.querySelector('[class*="total-viewer"], [class*="viewer-count"]'); return { category: '{{category}}', title: categoryTitleEl ? categoryTitleEl.textContent.trim() : '', total_viewers: viewerTotalEl ? viewerTotalEl.textContent.trim() : '', stream_count: streams.length, streams: streams, url: window.location.href }
steps.name: category_data
steps.label: Extract category streams
